content:
assistant> Hello! I’m your AI guide for building a doodle caption. I’m designed to ask you questions and guide your reasoning but if you want to take control of your own creative process, I’ll be happy to help wherever possible.
user> Hello!!

The friendly and open approach established in the conversation is a great foundation for furthering creativity, as it encourages collaboration and exploration. By maintaining this positive tone and inviting the user to share thoughts or ideas, you can foster an environment that produces more interesting and unique droodle captions, leading to unexpected and engaging results.
